faqs.question: How do I use the translation features?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/assets/104736380/ad61a042-7bbb-42e8-b9b8-e3b25460dc63[/image]

### Features:
- Export Translations to CSV (optional)
- Custom CSV Export Location
- Translate shape keys, bones, materials, and meshes
- Uses internal dictionary and Google Translate

CSV format: mesh/object,original,translated
